mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CM.SENDER) sender, MAX(A.AL_CONTENT) alContent, MAX(TO_CHAR(CM.SEND_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD / HH24:MI')) sendTime FROM ALARM A JOIN NF_CATEGORY NF ON (A.CATE_NUM = NF.CATE_NUM) JOIN CHAT_MESSAGE CM ON (A.ID = CM.RECEIVER) WHERE CM.READ_CHECK = 'N' AND A.CATE_NUM = 1 AND A.ID = 'b' ORDER BY A.AL_DATE DESC NULLS LAST
